author: ETA PRIME
description:
It's finally happening! We're starting to see official SteamOS support for the new Strix Point handhelds. With the recent SteamOS 3.7.9 beta update, the OS can now be installed on powerful new devices like the AOKZOE A1X and the Ayaneo 3.

These handhelds feature the AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370 "Strix Point" APU, which represents a significant leap in performance over previous generations. Many see this as the true successor to the Z1 Extreme.

I'm excited to see how a Strix Point handheld running SteamOS stacks up against two key benchmarks: the Lenovo Legion Go with its Ryzen Z1 Extreme and the incredibly popular Steam Deck OLED. This could be a game-changer for the handheld market!
